about.title: About LifeLegacy.me
about.introduction: LifeLegacy.me is a comprehensive digital estate planning platform designed to help you secure your digital legacy and ensure your digital assets are protected and transferred according to your wishes.
about.mission: Our mission is to simplify the complex process of digital estate planning, making it accessible and understandable for everyone. We believe that everyone deserves to have control over their digital legacy, regardless of technical expertise.
about.vision: Our vision is to create a world where digital estate planning is as common and straightforward as traditional estate planning, ensuring that your digital life is preserved and protected for generations to come.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for digital estate planning

documentManagement.title: Document Management
documentManagement.description: Securely store, organize, and manage all your important documents in one place, from wills and trusts to passwords and account details.

digitalAssets.title: Digital Assets
digitalAssets.description: Catalog your digital assets including social media accounts, cryptocurrency, and digital purchases to ensure your heirs can access what matters.

beneficiaries.title: Beneficiary Management
beneficiaries.description: Easily designate beneficiaries for specific assets and control exactly who gets access to what when the time comes.

security.title: Bank-Level Security
security.description: Rest easy knowing your sensitive information is protected with industry-leading encryption and security protocols.

notifications.title: Automated Notifications
notifications.description: Set up notifications to keep your plan updated and ensure your beneficiaries are informed when necessary.

planning.title: Legacy Planning
planning.description: Intuitive tools to guide you through the estate planning process, ensuring nothing is missed and your wishes are clear.
